UpdateParams defines an operation for updating the x/staking module
parameters.

<RequestSchema

  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.","type":"object","properties":{"authority":{"description":"authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).","type":"string"},"params":{"description":"params defines the x/staking parameters to update.\n\nNOTE: All parameters must be supplied.","type":"object","properties":{"bond_denom":{"description":"bond_denom defines the bondable coin denomination.","type":"string"},"historical_entries":{"description":"historical_entries is the number of historical entries to persist.","type":"integer","format":"int64"},"max_entries":{"description":"max_entries is the max entries for either unbonding delegation or redelegation (per pair/trio).","type":"integer","format":"int64"},"max_validators":{"description":"max_validators is the maximum number of validators.","type":"integer","format":"int64"},"min_commission_rate":{"type":"string","title":"min_commission_rate is the chain-wide minimum commission rate that a validator can charge their delegators"},"unbonding_time":{"description":"unbonding_time is the time duration of unbonding.","type":"string"}}}}}}},"description":"MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
